Doesn't matter, as long as the alliances are still valid. They are, right?
Before the transformation, your wife barely looked at you, yet, now that your lust has run dry for any woman, she has started to be passionate about your marriage.
Before the transformation, your husband barely looked at you, yet, now that your lust has run dry for any man, he has started to be passionate about your marriage.
This is getting even more awkward...

You feared this day would come since your transformation: your wife has pointed out several times how your marriage is no longer valid in the past weeks and now has finally gathered influence enough to annul it.

You feared this day would come since your transformation: your husband has pointed out several times how your marriage is no longer valid in the past weeks and now has finally gathered influence enough to annul it.
Well, it was getting somewhat weird...
Marry [RooT.GetFirstName]
Marry [RooT.GetFirstName]

The Chaos Gods have twisted and stretched your body to its limit, to the point you can barely recognize yourself any more. The many mutations have turned you into a horrific display of horns, scales and unnatural appendages.
Grlblgh...
More and more mutations have reshaped your body, turning you into a monstrous being.
Not entirely.
The Chaos Gods have undoubtedly touched you.
It's true...
The voices never shut up, sometimes reality changes before you in a blink of an eye: friend turns to foe, night to day. Is there anything at all real?
Blreagh!
Sometimes you just think all reality is part of a dream. And you are the dreamer. Those poor fools, not understanding they're just figments of your imagination...
Ah, idiots!
People sometimes look at you strangely, as if they were hiding something, but they never give you a straight answer if you inquire about them.
People are strange.

You've long followed the gods, trusted in their blessing and kept on honouring them in your every action, yet their gaze has not touched you, you've not received their gifts and have been left, with the voices in your head tormenting and berating you. The gods cursed and left you.
Nooorrrgh!!!

You cannot stand it any more: the powers of Chaos running through your body can no longer be contained by your will. With a shrieking sound your flesh twists and rips open as you turn into a mindless abomination.
AAArglrluablhjggghhh!!
Your existence of continued torment and hate as finally come to an end: whatever is left of your body collapses, completely ripped into shreds by the stuff of Chaos.
Gblurrggrhasghhh...
You feel a itch on your nose, but when you raise your hand to scratch it, you find yourself grasping at a growing hard beak, quickly taking it's place over your whole face.

You awoke with a sense of choking. You gasped, searching for air, but something large and wet is blocking your mouth. It takes some time to realize it is your very tongue, overgrown and extended to unnatural proportions.
Your teeth fall one after another. In their place long and rotten fangs sprout, until you can barely speak coherently.
More and more eyes open on your face, then your neck and, after that, your whole body is covered by blinking appendages.
Something it's irritating your eyes, but the more you scratch them, the more they burn. When you finally find peace, you realize your eyes have turned into bulging reptile-like things.
What was that shadow? You could have sworn you heard someone whispering behind your back. Why would someone follow you in the first place?
A plot?

People suffer all the time, but why care? As long as you are alright, there's nothing to be sad about. In fact, how could you consider yourself well-being, if not by comparison with those who are not?
Their suffering makes me feel better.
All this stress plaguing your mind is just too much. You need something to calm yourself, anything!
Some herbs might help, maybe?

Incompetent narrow-minded fools might play safe with magic, but you know better by now: one cannot truly master the Winds without taking a few risks. This last experiment might really help you better understanding the arcane.
Let's start now!
As you expected, the experiment was successful. Each day your mind opens more to the great secrets of the universe.
I must know more!
You spent an entire night of work for nothing: the secret of this spell still eludes you. All the time wasted for a failure is driving you mad.
I need to start again! I must know!
Collateral damage is inevitable when fighting for control over the great powers of the universe. You just hoped the fire wouldn't spread to yourself as well.
Aaargh!!
This is the last time you have to wake up with a damning headache without remembering what you did the previous night. Alcohol is poison and you shall not submit your brilliant mind to it ever again.
I've better things to think!

Nobody is truly ever evil, the more you think about it. All people have good reasons for their actions and those who are said to be wicked are just sad and lonely being, who were probably abused when young. Why should you add to their misery by branding them as villains?
There is no evil.
You've always known to be special, but you are certain now that the Winds of Magic flow through you, granting you powers that mere mortals only dream of.
I'm a powerful mage!

Most people don't see it, but in the end isn't life one big joke? You can see it now, it might be you just have keener senses or maybe you're the protagonist of this farce. Why else would other people not see the hilarity in murder or the humour in misery?
Ah ah ah ah ah!

For sometime now hardly anything has been able to trigger a response for you. As time passes by not only you do not feel any passion left for your loved ones nor hatred for your enemies, your very skin has started to lose any perception.
I feel... nothing.

Life is something miraculous, when you take one, you can feel all of the vibrant passions and dreams of a dying soul. It lasts but a moment, it's never enough to sate your thirst for death. And off you go, searching for the next target.
The blood calls...
People have always had to look up on you, they know you're better than them in every way and so do you. Are you even one of them, you wonder? Perhaps you are something more...
...more than a mortal!

You couldn't help it, it was such a beautiful scene... The body moves now, but soon your blade shall turn it into a motionless puppet and shall be able to watch as the soul passes away into the Realm beyond...
Soon...
The crazed [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has viciously killed your [GetFromRelation]. Rumours say the horrible murder was entirely without motive but the killer's sick pleasure.
Madness...
A single soul is not enough to satisfy you tonight: the will of the Great Reaper pervades you and within a week you've left a trail of blood and mangled corpses all over your lands.
Pile the bodies, create a canal with their blood!

A single soul is not enough to satisfy you tonight: the will of the Great Reaper pervades you, you summon the Winds of Magic at your fingertips and with a few words an entire building explodes, dragging into oblivion countless lives.
Kaboom!
The crazed [From.GetFirstName] has employed [From.GetHerHis] terrible magic to blow up a building in [From.GetHerHis] own lands, killing many of [From.GetHerHis] subjects in the process.
Madness...
Why should the thief be hanged when he only stole out of hunger? Is it his fault if he was born poor? Why should the murderer die? Wouldn't that make the executioner a murderer as well?
Nobody should get punished, ever!
There was a time when you revelled in other people's suffering, but, the more you look back at those days, the more you feel as if those people only deserved your pity.
Those poor souls...
You just visited your dungeons and saw a prisoner laying, chained on the wall. Why should anybody suffer like that?
You'll be freed at once!
With real power running through your veins you finally realize how deluded you were: only *now* you are a real mage!
This is amazing!

Even the most powerful wizards make mistakes from time to time. You were sure the potion would react well to your spell, but something might have gone wrong and the philtre just exploded into your face.
Ouch!

That disturbing smirk, it unsettles you. [From.GetFirstName] has spent a good chunk of [From.GetHerHis] day mocking you and laughing, claiming your mind has turned into mush and you're no longer good for anything.
This is the third time this week [From.GetFirstName] mocks and trips you, [From.GetSheHe] thinks the ailment affecting your body is something hilarious, the cynical freak.
You still have the laughter of [From.GetFirstName] echoing within your mind alongside that maniac's cruel quips on your painful disfigurement.
[From.GetFirstName] decided to spend [From.GetHerHis] morning chuckling behind you, poking at your sides and making fun of your generous figure, one shaming snark after the other.

[From.GetFirstName] decided to spend [From.GetHerHis] morning chuckling behind you, obviously pretending to be concerned about your frail health, not sparing jokes about you being skinnier than a shadow, barely capable of walking two steps without crumbling for exhaustion.
This is the third time this week [From.GetFirstName] mocks and trips you, [From.GetSheHe] thinks the illness weakening your body and plaguing your mind is something hilarious, the cynical freak.

Has [From.GetFirstName] no heart at all? Your pregnancy is a nightmare as it is without [From.GetHerHim] making fun at you with [From.GetHerHis] cruel jokes, patting your womb and scaring you with all the possible ways your labour could go wrong for both mother and child.

As if it wasn't enough trouble for you as it is, [From.GetFirstName] spent last evening cracking jokes about the corruption which is devouring your body, as if your mutations were a light topic of no real importance.
What goes [From.GetFirstName]'s mind? The disturbed freak spent all day pointing and laughing at you as if *you* were the insane maniac in the room, rather than [From.GetHerHim].
Enough! Stop it!
Watching that miserable fool [From.GetFirstName] trying to get back at you is almost as hilarious as [From.GetHerHis] irredeemably broken mind. You can't stop to chuckle at the thought of it.
All broken and sore, [From.GetFirstName] is such an easy target. The way [From.GetSheHe] walks, or tries to, it's the most humorous thing you saw in the week.
Rarely one has the benefit of entertaining himself with such a fantastic opportunity as [From.GetFirstName]'s mangled body. Tearing scabs off [From.GetHerHis] scourged skin it's just the best.

How can so few laugh at [From.GetFirstName]? A land whale such as [From.GetSheHe] is, slobbering over the palace all sweaty and bloated... It just calls to be pranked upon, yet people still think you are at fault, for some reason...

How can so few laugh at [From.GetFirstName]? That frail little thing, with [From.GetHerHis] skin barely covering [From.GetHerHis] bones... It just calls to be pranked upon, yet people still think you are at fault, for some reason...

Making fun of an ill person like [From.GetFirstName] has double the fun: not only you have to think of new quips to make at [From.GetHerHim], you have to keep a safe distance to avoid sharing [From.GetHerHis] state.

Why do other people have to always treat pregnant women with such care, as if they were something precious. Making fun at [From.GetFirstName] swollen body and sickly disposition gave you the best time of this month.

Small imperfections are already quite enough a cause for mocking, but a full blown third eye or fifth limb? [From.GetFirstName] just called for it. If [From.GetSheHe] didn't want to be made fun of, [From.GetSheHe] shouldn't have gotten the Dark Gods' attention, it's just that simple.

[From.GetFirstName] is as crazy as it goes. There's barely any point in mocking [From.GetHerHim], in the end. What else can you say that everybody hasn't thought of already? Still, that does make it quite a challenge to tackle...
AH AH AH AH AH AH!!!
What do you have to fear any more? No word or action can make you cry, no wound can inflame your mind with pain.
Nothing.
Even if somebody was conspiring against you, what would be the result? A dagger through your heart feel less than the morning's air to you.
I don't care any more.
You're just so desperate to *feel* something. You thought a blade could pierce deep enough to trigger some response, but, despite your efforts and all the blood spilled, no pain reached your mind.
Is there any point in closing these wounds?

You are marvellous and powerful god, it is time that your people started to treat you as such. They have to bow down and worship you, build statues in your honour, pray for you to judge mercifully their souls once they're dead.

You are beautiful and powerful goddess, it is time that your people started to treat you as such. They have to bow down and worship you, build statues in your honour, pray for you to judge mercifully their souls once they're be dead.
Bow before me!

Sigmar might have ascended in the long past, after he left this world, but you are a god now, divine blood ruling over this lands. Why should you bow down to one who is your equal, if not inferior to your might?

The gods rule from afar, rarely ever talking to their followers, all the gods except you. Your worshippers can see you, they can hear your terrible voice and heed to your commands. Why should you bow down to those who are your equals, if not inferior to your might?
I am your Lord and Master!
What even is love? You do not remember any more, nor you feel any passion left for those who claim to love you in return. There's no point in keeping such a charade.
I do not love you, nor anyone.
So far has [From.GetFirstName] descended into madness that [From.GetSheHe] has entirely forgotten what it means to love and be loved. Now [From.GetSheHe] feels nothing.
The one I loved is dead.
All the anger, all the hatred, they're gone. In the past the mere name of this person would have inflamed your heart, but now, it is not even worth of your attention.
I have neither enemies nor friends.
[From.GetFirstName] has been your rival for a long time, but now the affliction plaguing [From.GetHerHis] mind has wiped away any of [From.GetHerHis] emotion towards you.
I still don't like [From.GetHerHim]...

You've had friends in your life, but now the boundaries of camaraderie have been dissolved. You do not feel like you share anything with this person any more, nor the past experiences mean anything to you any more.
You are no longer my friend.
There was a time when you enjoyed [From.GetFirstName]'s company, but now [From.GetSheHe] has grown cold and detached. There's no friendship or interest left within [From.GetHerHis] mind for you.
It was good while it lasted.
With the death of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] the Druchii Sorceresses of Ghrond have elected another to lead their cabal: [From.GetTitledFirstName].
I see...
The Sorceresses of Ghrond seem to be mostly approving of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. While not a certainty, [From.GetSheHe] may well be the next to rule over the cabal of Ghrond.
I see...

The dreaded black tower of Ghrond has been home of Druchii Sorceresses for millennia. The old elven hags study magic and plot for power within its walls. It's unlikely for a Druchii to rule over them without their approval.
Hmpf.

Are the creatures tearing reality and coming into your world, or are they a figment of your own imagination, created by the substances running through your veins? In either case, their mere sight is too horrifying to handle.
AAAAHH!!
When you lay down, your mind filled with the strangest stuff, you ponder over the mysteries of the universe. It is amazing what a new perspective can do to widen a person's mindset.
The music... of the universe...
A thousand enemies hide behind your very shadow. Every time you enhance your senses you can almost see them, lurking outside of reality.
We must be prepared!
Taking a few spoonful of dust is just what you need to calm yourself and let all the worries of the world pass away as your mind is populated by the strangest things.
Hello, guys!
You must have more stuff, your reserves have been almost entirely depleted, but the supplier is having a hard time finding any new batch this year.
I don't care how much it costs! Just find more!
The waiting is killing me!!
It has been sometime since beer and wine lost much of their appeal to you. They all taste stale and you cannot bear the headache coming after each drinking night.
I've better things to consume...
Is this even a life? Waiting from one dose to the other, unable to relish any event without your mind being clouded by hallucinations and paranoid delusions.
No more.
I can't... stop it...

You could have sworn you had a holding in [Root.GetName], but there's nothing left. As you wonder what could have happened, you see the fortress flying over your head with wings of stone and disappearing in the the distance.
Oh, well...
A servant comes running at you, screaming the ground has turned into a giant mouth and started taking bites off one of your buildings.
That... is expected?
A band of Kurgan has come from afar to pledge its allegiance to you, hoping to share in your glory and the favour of the Gods.
Welcome, comrades!
You wake up to see a giant blinking eye staring back at you, mounted on a pair of hairy human legs. When you flinch, the creature jumps off your bed and runs off with a squeaking sound.
What the...?
The influence of Chaos is strong in the province of [Root.GetName]. The great portal is attracting everything towards it and things have started to fall up, rather than down.
Hold tight!

An indescribable vortex of horror and insanity has opened in the province of [Root.GetName], dragging people and beasts inside to the Realm of Chaos and spewing forth crazed daemons and eldritch beings of horrific might and intent.
Run for your lives!
The great warp rift in [Root.GetName] has swallowed a great deal of troops battling in that land.
The great warp rift in [Root.GetName] has swallowed a great deal of troops battling in that land.
A giant mound of yellow dirt has grown within these lands for a couple of days and now it finally explodes, releasing all sorts of venomous and sickly gasses.
Ugh...
Within a few days an unearthly beautiful garden, filled with fruits and intoxicating rivers of mead has grown in these lands bringing pleasure and luxury to its inhabitants.
Where...?
All the rivers and wells in these lands have turned red, their water transformed into blood. It's mere taste seems enough to send even the most peaceful man into a frenzy.
Hmm...
Shadows in these lands have stopped following their owners. In fact, they are starting to talk and congregate and many swear they are plotting to kill their masters.
We must kill them first!
A storm of flying fingers has attacked the soldiers in [Root.GetName], causing several deaths.
A storm of flying fingers has attacked the soldiers in [Root.GetName], causing several deaths.
A horde of daemons wandering in the Wastes has engaged the soldiers in [Root.GetName], killing many amongst them.
A horde of daemons wandering in the Wastes has engaged the soldiers in [Root.GetName], killing many amongst them.
A giant tentacle made of flowers has swallowed many besieging soldiers in [Root.GetName].
A giant tentacle made of flowers has swallowed many besieging soldiers in [Root.GetName].
Visions of inhuman beauty and terrifying monstrosities are driving the commanders stationed in [Root.GetName] insane. Some have started plucking their eyes out just to escape the horror.
Visions of inhuman beauty and terrifying monstrosities are driving the commanders stationed in [Root.GetName] insane. Some have started plucking their eyes out just to escape the horror.
As time passes, you still feel the twinging of magic, it's very distant, probably you wouldn't understand what it was if your people didn't know so much about it, but it's still there.

As time passes, you still feel the twinging of magic, it's very distant, probably you wouldn't understand what it was if your people didn't know so much about it, but it's still there. Sometimes you might understand the meaning behind a animal's cry or seem to move an object without touching it.

As time passes, it seems clear now you are clearly a wizard in the making: since your childhood you've felt the Winds of Magic and instinctively tried to influence their flow. If only you found a teacher

When your eyes are closed you can still see the Winds of Magic flowing through the world. Such is your potential in magic that you've already managed to warp reality through your will a couple of times.
I must know more!
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has shown some crude predisposition in the arcane matters.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has shown some basic predisposition in the arcane matters and, if taught well, could become a talented wizard one day.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has shown a clear potential for magic, if taught [From.GetSheHe] could be come a truly powerful wizard.

Rarely was seen a natural in the ways of magic like your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. With a proper training [From.GetSheHe] could easily become one of the greatest magic users of your time.
Something to ponder about...
Luckly the strange sensation is nothing but a far away twitching at the border of your consciousness. You've hidden it, isolated it... You know that it's bad news and you must keep it under wraps.

Luckly the strange sensation is nothing but a far away twitching at the border of your consciousness. You've hidden it, isolated it... You know that it's bad news and you must keep it under wraps. When magic is concerned, it's better to keep quiet about it.

Since your childhood you've felt the Winds of Magic and instinctively tried to influence their flow. This experience has never failed to scare you, almost as much as what could possibly happen to you if you were not accepted by society because of your powers. You've thus decided to keep your potential hidden.

Even when your eyes are closed you can still see the Winds of Magic flowing through the world. Such is your potential in magic that you've already managed to warp reality through your will a couple of times. You can barely help yourself to not do it, but you must. You fear what would happen to you if your secret was to be discovered.
Why me?

Luckly the strange sensation is nothing but a far away twitching at the border of your consciousness. You've hidden it, isolated it... You know that it's bad news and you must keep it under wraps from the courtiers and, most of all, your liege.

Luckly the strange sensation is nothing but a far away twitching at the border of your consciousness. You've hidden it, isolated it... You know that it's bad news and you must keep it under wraps. When magic is concerned, it's better to keep quiet about it from the courtiers and, most of all, your liege.

Since your childhood you've felt the Winds of Magic and instinctively tried to influence their flow. This experience has never failed to scare you, almost as much as what could possibly happen to you if you were not accepted by society because of your powers. You've thus decided to keep your potential hidden from the courtiers and, most of all, your liege.

Even when your eyes are closed you can still see the Winds of Magic flowing through the world. Such is your potential in magic that you've already managed to warp reality through your will a couple of times. You can barely help yourself to not do it, but you must. You fear what would happen to you if your secret was to be discovered.
Why me?
Your predisposition to magic was barely even something you had realized about yourself, yet your liege had much keener eyes on the matter and was quick to expose you.
Your predisposition to magic was barely even something you had realized about yourself, yet your liege had much keener eyes on the matter and was quick to expose you.
Since your childhood you feared your predisposition to magic would have betrayed you someday. And today that day has come: your liege has found out about your gift.
Since your childhood you feared your predisposition to magic would have betrayed you someday. And today that day has come: your liege has found out about your gift.
Wait! I can explain!
It was hard to spot, but you are certain now your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has some faint connection with the Winds of Magic.
It was hard to spot, but you are certain now your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has some connection with the Winds of Magic.
How could it have passed unnoticed for all these years? Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has clearly a strong connection to the Winds of Magic.

How could it have passed unnoticed for all these years? Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has clearly a strong connection to the Winds of Magic. So strong could [From.GetHerHis] powers grow, if left unchecked...
Burn [From.GetHerHim]!
He might be the Chosen One! Kill him!
This is not a concern of mine.
I don't care! I won't hide who I am.
You think you've discovered sound proof of witchcraft perpetrated in the county you're hunting in. It is time to confront the perpetrator of these foul and diabolic rituals.
I will!
The Witch Hunter [From.GetFirstName] has come to you, accusing you of worshipping the Ruinous Powers and drawing from the nefarious Winds of Magic to perform dark deeds.
*Appeal to liege*
*Banish the Witch Hunter*
*Imprison the Witch Hunter*
The Witch Hunter [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has accused your [GetFromRelation] -[From.GetTitledFirstName] of meddling with the forbidden lore and casting evil spells in [From.GetHerHis] private time.
Burn [From.GetHerHim]!
I shall be merciful.
You shall be thrown in the darkest dungeon.

You've finally been discovered for what you are. The Witch Hunters have found out about your dark tidings and your forbidden knowledge and have sieged your palace by surprise, with the help of your liege, to drag you on the stake.
I curse you ALL!!!
Witch!! Witch!! Witch!!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was burned at the stake on charges of witchcraft.
I don't care about these things...
I see...
You've discovered another amongst your servants, [From.GetTitledFirstName], who thought he could secretely practice the dark arts to grow more powerful than you and kill you.
There is no doubt about it: your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] shows the gift of a sorcerer-to-be. Why else would he have hid this from you if not to plot against your throne?
I shall not die by your sorcery!
The prophecy must not be fulfilled. Not even by you, my son.

The Witch-King discovered of your meddling with the dark arts and has quickly sent his best assassins to deal with you. Before you can even react, the shadowy druchii sink their blades in your back time and again.
Hhhggghhh...

[From.GetFirstName] is dragged and bound at the centre of the summoning circle while you start chanting the spell. What daemon should you call forth from the Warp to inhabit [From.GetHerHis] body and devour [From.GetHerHis] soul?
I call forth a Flamer of Tzeentch!
I call forth a Plaguebearer of Nurgle!
I call forth a Daemonette of Slaanesh!
I call forth a Bloodletter of Khorne!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged you in [From.GetHerHis] summoning circle to perform some dark ritual, but at the last moment you manage to break free of your boundaries and interrupt the ritual. In the backlash of magical fires, you sneak out of the room, fleeing from your captor.
That was close.

Just a few words before the ritual is complete, [From.GetFirstName] manages to get free of [From.GetHerHis] boundaries, interrupting the ritual. Even worse, the backlash of the broken spell creates enough of a distraction to allow the prisoner to escape.
Gahhh!!!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged you in [From.GetHerHis] summoning circle to perform some dark ritual, but after the spell has been completed, something seem to go wrong. You feel something crawling inside you, but your body cannot handle the stress and you explode all over the room.
It would seem the recipient was not appropriate. The spell somehow fails and the prisoner explodes into a bloody pulp.
Just... fetch me some new clothes.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged you in [From.GetHerHis] summoning circle to perform some dark ritual. A long series of incomprehensible words are spouted and some blood is spilled and finally a small portal opens and something slips through and crawls inside you.
Nnnhghgnnnhh!!!

The summoning is a success: the body of the prisoner starts twisting and burning as the Flamer reshapes it in a cacophony of discordant voices and writhing colours. Yet, something went wrong with the wards. The daemon slips away right after inhabiting the body, free to roam the world unbound.
Curses! So close.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged you in [From.GetHerHis] summoning circle to perform some dark ritual. A long series of incomprehensible words are spouted and some blood is spilled and finally a small portal opens and something slips through and crawls inside you.

The summoning is a success: the body of the prisoner starts tearing itself apart as the Bloodletter reshapes it in a wave of bone and blood. Yet, something went wrong with the wards. The daemon slips away right after inhabiting the body, free to roam the world unbound.
Curses! So close.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged you in [From.GetHerHis] summoning circle to perform some dark ritual. A long series of incomprehensible words are spouted and some blood is spilled and finally a small portal opens and something slips through and crawls inside you.
Nnnhghgnnnhh!!

The summoning is a success: the body of the prisoner starts tearing itself apart as the Bloodletter reshapes it in a wave of bone and blood. The wards bound the creature, who awaits for your commands.
Good.
You've prepared the summoning circle and all the needed materials to temporarily open a portal to the Warp and summon a daemon into this world. Which creature should you call?
I call forth a Flamer of Tzeentch!
I call forth a Plaguebearer of Nurgle!
I call forth a Daemonette of Slaanesh!
I call forth a Bloodletter of Khorne!
I call forth a K'daai of Hashut!

Despite your best efforts, the circle was not strong enough to contain the eldritch energies of the Chaos Realm. The Warp breaks through and a host of cavorting daemons drags you with them to meet their masters.
Noooooo!!!
The Flamer slowly takes form before you, a collection of mouths and gooey limbs spitting fire and steaming ichor. The circle holds and the daemon is yours to command.
I am your Master now.

The Plaguebearer slowly takes form before you, a humanoid creature with rotten skin, skinny limbs and a bloated belly filled with worms and decayed entrails. The circle holds and the daemon is yours to command.
I am your Master now.
The Daemonette slowly takes form before you, an alluring androgynous creature with pale, silken skin bounded by hard chitin. The circle holds and the daemon is yours to command.
I am your Master now.
The Bloodletter slowly takes form before you, a screaming red-skinned monster eager for battle.  The circle holds and the daemon is yours to command.
I am your Master now.
There's a creature of one of my Master's enemies in this land. I cannot tolerate it!
Die!
We are many and our Master is one. It's time to drag the wizard to our home.
Yessss.

In your pride you thought the host of daemons in your service would be easy to control. But you were wrong: the creature of the Warp have banded against you and, easily overcoming your powers, they drag you screaming into the Realm of the Dark Gods.
Noooooo!!!
A ravenous Bloodletter of Khorne has come to you, offering you promises of future conquests and victories and standing ready to do your bidding. Or so it says.
A decayed Plaguebearer of Nurgle has come to you, offering its eternal love and plenty of gifts from its Dark Master.
A luscious Daemonette of Slaanesh has come to you, offering you to lead you through uncharted heights of pleasure and joy. Or so she claims.
A raving Flamer of Tzeentch has come to you, offering you the power of the endless fires of the Changer of Ways.
A searing K'daai of Hashut has come to you, offering you the might and riches of the Bullfather's forges.
I am your Master now.
I don't need you.
Daemon Hunt
There is a nefarious presence plaguing this province. A daemonic being might be at work.
It won't hide for longer...
[wh_witch_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has tracked down a daemon hiding in your lands. The Witch Hunter is certain of the existence of the creature and requires your support to trap and cleanse it.
Yes, destroy it!
We have other things to worry about...
You've received support from your liege and are ready to spring the trap on the daemon and cleanse the land from its evil influence.
Let us proceed.

The creature of Chaos revealed itself to be stronger than the Witch Hunter's faith. [From.GetFirstName]'s remains were found scattered in the main square, alongside the entrails of the soldiers you provided [From.GetHerHim] with. There is no trace of the beast.
The gods protect us!

A nosy Witch Hunter has managed to find out about your familiar. The daemon revealed itself to be more cunning than [From.GetHerHim] and managed to kill [From.GetHerHim], but it was also put on the run, rescinding the contract which was binding it to you.
Damnations!
The accursed mortals have managed to trap you. You fight for as long as you can, but the Witch Hunters are finally able to send you screaming back to the Chaos Realm.
Grreeaaaahhhh!!!
An accursed Witch Hunter, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has managed to trap and destroy your familiar. Luckly for now, the connection between the two of you remains hidden.
Damnations!

After the cleansing of the daemon, you've spent a lot of time trying to figure out who the wicked creature of darkness was serving and you've finally concluded it must have been [From.GetTitledFirstName].
No one can escape the righteous wrath of Sigmar.
The Witch Hunter [From.GetFirstName] has managed to rally some ridiculous sort of "proof" regarding you consorting with daemons and demands now your confession.
*Appeal to liege*
*Banish the Witch Hunter*
*Imprison the Witch Hunter*
[From.GetTitledFirstName] stands accused, by [FromFrom.GetFirstName], on charges of consorting with daemons.
Burn [From.GetHerHim]!
This is just posturing!
Throw [From.GetHerHim] in the darkest dungeon!
Papa Nurgle has brought forth good tidings and plentiful bounties for all the good people in the world. Today its servant has decided to honour you.
Ugh...
[From.GetFirstName] craves to see what your worth is or spill your blood for Khorne. Would you accept the daemon's challenge and fight with it?
Let's fight!
You're beneath me.
The fight goes on until the daemon is prone on the ground, leaking ichor from numerous wounds. You're tired, but you've learned something more about battle.
This is your place, vermin.
You try your best, but nobody ends the fight as victor. Even worse, the Bloodletter manages to sink its claws deep in your flesh a couple of times.
Grrnnhhh...
Despite your efforts, the daemon swiftly overcomes your defences and tears your body apart, leaving you near-dead on the ground.
Gllfgrrnnthh...
You push the daemon back time and again and such is your display of violence that you feel the gaze of Khorne bearing upon you, granting your body new strength.
Victory!
[From.GetFirstName] awaits you inside your rooms. The daemonette lures you in your bed, whispering honeyed words and promising you to unravel secrets from beyond the veil, if only you'd let her.
Yes, please!
Maybe another time...
The lips of the daemon feel cold at the first kiss, but they quickly gain an exotic and irresistible flavour. And at every new taste of her, you feel as if your mind is opening to new horizons.
More, more!...
Enough!
The whispers within your mind are getting louder. There is no doubt something else has found home within your body and is now struggling to wrestle its control from you.
Never!

Your blood boils to the point of burning your flesh from the inside out. The daemon inside you keeps on tearing at your soul, taking away whatever is left of your consciousness, until your body has been completely transfigured and there is nothing left of you inside it.

One malady after the other, the daemon has completely devastated your body, to the point you yourself can barely recognize it. In the unimaginable suffering you are submitted to by your flesh slowly rotting away and worms feeding off your entrails, you finally accept the daemon's welcoming embrace to oblivion.

No mortal indulgence can satiate your cravings any more. The burning desire instilled by the daemon is too much to bear, and it finally breaks your mind entirely as the daemon starts feasting on your soul, one delicious piece at a time.
More and more mutations wreck your body, repurposing it to the daemon's whims. At every change, you lose another part of yourself, until there's finally nothing left but the unholy creature.
BLOOD AND SKULLS!!!
The Great Father watches over you...
Time for some *real* fun!
Krlleeaaaach!!!
A never-ending rage burns through your body. You cannot rest, you cannot sleep, even the slightest wrong sends you into a roaring rampage.
Blood! BLOOOD!!!
You tighten your hold on the courtier's neck, your vision blurred by rage. You don't know who that is or what he did to you, you only know that you won't find peace until you've disembowelled him.
Die! Die! DIE!!!
People feel safe in passing their titles to their children. They grow lazy heirs. Worthless! The only right by blood is the one gained by spilling that of your enemies!
Only the strongest rule!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has issued a declaration regarding all [From.GetHerHis] vassals: from this day forward, all of your lands will be inherited only by those who show themselves worthy of them by testing their mettle in battle.
Hmm...
You first started just to crave more from your favourite sex, but now your lust has grown insatiable. Men, women, children... Nothing can sate your appetites any longer.
More! More!

You pin the courtier on the wall and start tearing apart their clothes with inhuman strength. Your vision is blurred and you've yet to realize if you caught a man or a woman, but that surprise will be part of the fun when you slam yourself on them and start having your way with them.
No, no, don't keep quiet! I liked you screaming...

You crawl on the table, reaching for another plate further away from your reach. You've not stopped eating since morning, but the more the pain in your stomach grows, the more you feel compelled stuffing it more.
Glmmglrrghh...

You've nearly turned blind with the last barrel of wine and cannot stand on your feet any longer, but you still crawl to the next. You've lost your chalice, therefore you just hug the cask and start suckling from it.
Glglglgllglh...
Why do you have to be bothered entertaining all those ugly, old harpies? From now on, only young and beautiful men shall be allowed in your realm.
Why do you have to have only ugly, old men as your servant? From now on, only young and beautiful women shall be allowed in your realm.
Now we'll finally have someone interesting around here...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decreed that henceforth only men will hold any position of worth inside [From.GetHerHis] realm.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decreed that henceforth only women will hold any position of worth inside [From.GetHerHis] realm.
Hmm...
You sneeze once more a copious amount of snot dropping on your chest and dripping all over your clothes.
Bleah...
Scores of boils have appeared all over your body, another of the charming gifts bestowed upon you by the daemon inside you.
Ggghhh...
A terrible fever has struck you, weakening your body and giving you horrible visions of the Realms of Chaos.
Ggghhh...

You can barely sleep any longer. You can feel the presence of the daemon inside you, whispering, pulling your flesh from the inside, turning it into something monstrous. You can see every little detail of your body which is slowly changing, while being unable to do anything about it.
No, no, no!
To each his own, and to everyone something. Your realm will be better off with the lands and title divided unevenly between all. It's certain to create a lot of interesting situations.
Indeed!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decreed all lands to be split on death of their possessor between all of their heirs, with the main beneficiary being the one with the most support.
Hmm...
Control is but an illusion, why pretend it to exist in the first place?
No more!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decreed all laws of the realm to be null and void. Only the rule of the strong and cunning will determine the loyalty of the servants towards the masters.
Hmm...
Everybody expect the firstborn to be the favourite, everybody grooms him to be the best. It is the turn of the youngest now!
Truly!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decreed that enceforth all lands shall be inherited by the youngest sons and daughters of the realm and no longer the eldest.
Hmm...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to ambush you with the help of a few guards and is now starting to recite some ominous spell while the others bind you. The chanting goes on for hours, until finally you feel the daemon being torn from you with excruciating resistance and be banished into the warp.
Aaaarrgghh!!

Luckly you manage to ambush [From.GetFirstName] with the help of a few guards and start reciting the exorcism as they bind [From.GetHerHim]. The chanting goes on for hours, until finally you see the daemon being torn from [From.GetHerHis] with excruciating resistance and be banished into the warp.
Praised be [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to ambush you with the help of a few guards and is now starting to recite some ominous spell while the others bind you. The chanting goes on for hours, until finally you feel the daemon being torn from you with excruciating resistance and be banished into the warp.
Aaaarrgghh!!
You can feel it now: the daemon leaving you was nothing but an illusion! The presence has resurfaced again, gnawing at your soul!
Not again!
It would seem your spell did not in fact succeeded in freeing [From.GetTitledFirstName] from the evil presence hiding inside [From.GetHerHim].
Curses.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to ambush you with the help of a few guards and is now starting to recite some ominous spell while the others bind you. The chanting goes on for hours, but the daemon has sunk its teeth inside you and doesn't let the body go without dragging your soul away as well.
Aaaarrgghh!!

While the exorcism started for the better, the daemon did not leave its host without consequences: the foul creature dragged away the soul of [From.GetTitledFirstName], leaving an empty and lifeless shell behind.
Curses.

The daemon struggles as the last shred of life leaves your body. The welcoming cold of death is a balm for your mind and you can only laugh at the now-desperate attempts of the ethereal creature to hold onto you.
No soul left to eat. Time to leave, pathetic creature!

You cannot rest, nightmares of lightning and blood tear your mind every time you try to sleep.
'YOU DARE TO CLAIM BLOOD AND GLORY WITH COWARDLY MEANS?! HOW CAN YOU KEEP DISHONORING YOURSELF WITH MAGIC!?!.'
In every dream the great armoured hound looks down upon you from his throne, berating and belittling you.
'I HAVE NO USE FOR WEAKLINGS AND DECEIVERS!'
Continue.
Then take away the stain of magic, Lord of Skulls, so that I may serve you better!

Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has requested you to prepare a summoning circle, for [From.GetSheHe] desires for you to call a daemon from the Realms of Chaos and bind the creature into [From.GetHerHis] service.
Very well, I shall do it.
No. It's not worth the risk.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused your request, pointing you out the dangers of opening a portal to the Realm of Chaos.
Hmpf.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted your requests. When the fateful night comes, [From.GetSheHe] prepares the summoning circle and all the needed ingredients and, with you at [From.GetHerHis] side, starts chanting the summoning spell that will bring a daemon into your world.
You are not sure of what is happening until too late: the ritual has failed. A host of terrifying daemons break through the summoning circle to drag you and the sorcerer into the Realms of Chaos.
Noooooo!!!
Your ritual for [From.GetFirstName] was a success. You've managed to bind a raving Flamer to [From.GetHerHim].
Excellent.
Your ritual for [From.GetFirstName] was a success. You've managed to bind a decomposing Plaguebearer to [From.GetHerHim].
Excellent.
Your ritual for [From.GetFirstName] was a success. You've managed to bind an alluring Daemonette to [From.GetHerHim].
Excellent.
Your ritual for [From.GetFirstName] was a success. You've managed to bind a brutal Bloodletter to [From.GetHerHim].
Excellent.
Ghrond

By decree of the Witch King all women who show the potential for sorcery must turn themselves in so as to be properly trained in Ghrond, where they study the lore of dark magic in one of the six Covens founded by Morathi. They shall take no man nor bear any children and will live on only to serve the Witch King as his spiritual brides.
I will relinquish my possessions and go.
No! I can still hide it... Keep on living like this...

Your attempt at hiding your potential in magic could not go unnoticed forever to the eyes of Naggaroth. The servants of the Witch King have discovered your secret in the end and forced you to go to Ghrond, as it is your duty.
It was good while it lasted.

Your daughter shows talent for magic, she has therefore been sent to Ghrond to study with the Covens of Morathi. This is a great honour for your house, as she will now become a bride of the Witch King.
A great honour indeed.
Another daughter of a noble house has been recognized as a potential apprentice and has been sent to Ghrond to receive proper teaching and become a Sorceress of the Covens.
Good.
The trials of Ghrond are harsh and unforgiving. Only the most gifted and cunning amongst the druchii summoned will manage to achieve mastery over the dark powers and claim their place as Sorceresses.
I must keep learning.
You've spent years in the dark tower and all your hard work has finally paid off. You have taken your rightful place as a bride of the Witch King, a Sorceress of the Coven.

Despite your best intentions, you have not managed to pass all the trials and the ruling hags of Ghrond have not deemed you worthy of taking place amongst them. Bound against your will, you shall be turned into a mindless servant, only employed to satiate the Witch King's lust.
So I have.
Gooooohhh...?
Your daughter has shown herself to be worthy of the title of Sorceress. She has taken her place within the Covens, bringing more honour to your great House.
Good for her. And for me.
Your daughter has disgraced herself: she was not able to pass the final tests to become a proper Sorceress and has now been reduced to a worthless mindless slave in the Witch King's harem.
Disgusting child.
Your Master seems a little lonely. Maybe the mortal would like to spend some quality time with you?
HmmmHmm...
Hoeth
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] thinks you show talent in magic and has signed you up to study with the Loremasters of Hoeth.
A great honour!
Every Apprentice in Hoeth has to dedicate himself to countless hours of study to assimilate the centuries of knowledge accumulated in the great libraries.
I'll do my best.
The scion of a noble house shows talent for magic and has been sent to be taught amongst the Loremasters of Hoeth.
We will welcome this new apprentice.
The your long years of study have finally paid off. You can feel the magic within you and have been officially recognized as a respected Asur Mage.
Despite your efforts, Magic just doesn't seem the right path for you.
I will use these powers wisely.
I tried my best.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has achieved [From.GetHerHis] goal and graduated from Hoeth as an official Asur Mage, a prestigious accomplishment for [From.GetHerHim] and your House.
Good.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] was unable to reach [From.GetHerHis] full potential and, after a series of mishaps, has been expelled from Hoeth.
You're a disgrace!
A foul Sorcerer has come to your lands, claiming to have had visions of your future victories from the Gods. The wandering traveller is willing to settle in your court in exchange for a meagre price.
You are welcome.
We have no such money to spare.
A Shaman has come to your lands, gaining some favour amongst the locals. The soothsayer is willing to join your court and provide their services for a meagre price.
You are welcome.
We have no such money to spare.

A mysterious visitor from the deserts has come to your court. Apparently he is a famous scholar from a faraway land, gifted in the arts of magic and he'd be willing to stay and offer his services to you for a meagre pay.
You are welcome.
We have no such money to spare.
A travelling Witch has decided to settle at your court. She has requested a few things for her stay, but there's no way of you to refusing her.
You... are welcome.
Your guardian has the reputation of a powerful magician. And being in the company of such an individual has made you wondering if you could become a mage as well, when you grow up.
Can you teach me?
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has expressed a desire to learn magic from you as your apprentice.
Of course.
Not a chance.
You're taking too long. Perhaps you do not have the gift of magic.
Drats.
[From.GetFirstName] does not think you have what it takes to wield magic and has dismissed your request.
But I do!
You've been delighted to know your [GetFromRelation] was quite happy to take you as [From.GetHerHis] apprentice and teach you in the ways of the Winds of Magic.
Yes! I won't disappoint you, I promise.
Teaching someone how to feel and channel the Winds of Magic is no easy task. What do you want [From.GetFirstName] to be taught?
I'll teach [From.GetHerHim] about caution.
A mage must keep an open mind and experiment new things.
One cannot channel the arcane powers without focus and discipline.
It is time to test [From.GetHerHim].

Your [GetFromRelation] is spending a lot of time teaching you of how a mage should be cautious. Of how tricky and deceitful daemons are and of how so easily a spell can turn in a catastrophe fore everyone involved.
I'll try and be careful.

Your [GetFromRelation] is spending a lot of time teaching you of how a mage should be bold and inventing. Of how you shouldn't just learn from [From.GetHerHim], but search your own knowledge and create new ways of turning the Winds.
I will!

Your [GetFromRelation] is spending a lot of time teaching you of how a mage should never lose his calm and maintain absolute discipline at all times, for it is a vital component for casting even the simplest spell.
I'm trying to, really!
You've spent years over dusty tomes and stinking potions under your [GetFromRelation]'s tutelage, but it has all paid off: you can feel the magic inside you and call it through your will.

You've spent years over dusty tomes and stinking potions under your [GetFromRelation]'s tutelage, but it was all for naught: you're no closer to casting the first cantrip as you were when you started.
This is just the beginning.
Why can't I do it?!

Your work with [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has paid off: [From.GetSheHe] has started casting [From.GetHerHis] first spells without any help and is likely to go on [From.GetHerHis] studies without need of your tutelage.
Good.
It seems your [GetFromRelation] has succeeded in [From.GetHerHis] apprenticeship and is now a fully qualified mage.
A great accomplishment for sure.

Your work with [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been in vain: [From.GetSheHe] doesn't appear able to call for the Winds of Magic and might as well have no power at all in [From.GetHerHis] blood.
What a waste of time.
It seems your [GetFromRelation] has failed in [From.GetHerHis] apprenticeship and is unlikely to ever become a mage.
What a loss...

The Winds of Chaos will favour only the chosen ones of the Gods. To prepare [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] must give in to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and his unholy worship and live by his tenets.
I will speak to [From.GetHerHim] of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
I will teach [From.GetHerHim] the tenets of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
All the same, [From.GetSheHe] needs to learn of incantation.
I feel the Gods will soon test [From.GetHerHis] resolve...

Your [GetFromRelation] is spending quite a lot of time talking about someone called the Changer of Ways and of how he could grant you infinite powers beyond your imagination, if only you were to forsake the faith of your ancestors and embrace him as your only Master.

Your [GetFromRelation] is spending quite a lot of time talking about someone called the Lord of the Flies and of how his warm embrace could grant you great powers and a safe haven from pain and death, if only you were to forsake the faith of your ancestors and love him back.

Your [GetFromRelation] is spending quite a lot of time talking about someone called the Dark Prince and how he could make you feel better than you ever did in your entire life and show you marvels beyond your comprehension, if only you were to relinquish the faith of your ancestors and bow to him.
Seems a good bargain.
No, I don't like him!
[From.GetFirstName] has finally accepted of how only Tzeentch can lead [From.GetHerHim] to the true mastery over the Winds of Magic.
[From.GetFirstName] has finally understood and welcomed the unconditioned love of Papa Nurgle in [From.GetHerHis] heart, hoping to receive his gift in return soon.
[From.GetFirstName] has finally felt Slaanesh's touch and yearns for more, aware of the uncharted heights of pleasure [From.GetSheHe] has still to reach.
Excellent.

[From.GetFirstName] is still stubbornly refusing to accept Tzeentch as [From.GetHerHis] new Master. For some reason [From.GetSheHe] does not understand how only the uncontested Lord of Magic could grant [From.GetHerHim] the power you have.
[From.GetFirstName] is still rudely rejecting Nurgle's love. The Lord of the Flies is magnanimous and will keep bestowing his gifts, as will you, hoping in a change of heart.
[From.GetFirstName] is still squeamish about the delights Slaanesh and you are presenting to [From.GetHerHim].
Everyone comes around, eventually.

It's hard to sleep after all your [GetFromRelation] warns you about everyday. Everyone is everyone's enemy. Power can be gained only through deceit and a cunning mind. You will only ever manage to learn magic from [From.GetHerHim] by stealing [From.GetHerHis] knowledge.
It was a little disconcerting at starts, but having to not worry about cuts and illness is such a relief. Your [GetFromRelation]'s god is truly a kind and generous Master.
It's hard to understand half of the things your [GetFromRelation] tells and does to you, but you've started to gain more and more curiosity as you experienced the delights offered by the Dark Prince.
But what about spells?

[From.GetFirstName] has finally decided to spare some time to teach you about mustering control over the Winds of Chaos. Most of it is still gibberish to you, but you cannot do much about it, for now.
What does this mean?

The Changer of Ways has seen fit to bless your pupil with power over reality, as you knew he would. Your [GetFromRelation] is set up on a path to greatness. In fact, maybe you were to generous to the little brat. What if [From.GetSheHe] becomes a threat to your plans, now?

Grandfather Nurgle has bestowed a most precious gift upon your apprentice, allowing [From.GetHerHim] to finally have full control over the Winds of Chaos. Soon, your young new friends will share the love of the Lord of the Flies to many more unwilling people.
The Serpent is pleased with you and your pupil and has seen fit to grant [From.GetHerHim] a speck of his power to let [From.GetHerHis] fantasies grow wilder still.
Success.

The plans of Tzeentch go beyond the comprehension of the rabble. Evidently your [GetFromRelation] was not gifted enough and when the Changer of Ways touched [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetHerHis] body and mind could not bear his awesome power.
Sadly, for once, Papa Nurgle might have been a little too generous: your [GetFromRelation] has collapsed beneath his many gifts.

Your [GetFromRelation] revealed [From.GetHerHim]self a failure. Your pupil just doesn't seem to have enough imagination for you or your Dark Prince's tastes, despite [From.GetHerHis] many despertate efforts.
What a waste.

A rush of power goes through your body each time you invoke one of Tzeentch's names, the Winds of Magic ready to bow to your every whim and warp reality at a mere gesture of your hands. Truly, your long years of study with [From.GetFirstName] have paid off.

Many gifts has Grandfather Nurgle bestowed upon you, but it finally came the time for magic to be amongst them. There so much you feel you can do right now and the Lord of the Flies is certain to give you all the time you could wish for.

Magic has finally come to you and you could barely spend any time sleeping in the past week: so much to experiment, so much to change and cut and sew with invisible fingers and unearthly precision. The Serpent has given you his greatest tool to express your art across the entire world.
Finally! Power!
Graboliwayghsggrksukaeàfakjcsahxbghhhhh!!!
Papa Nurgle has blessed you just too much.
Slaanesh is still unimpressed with you. It looks like you've lost his interest and won't become a mage any time soon.
Noooooo!!!

Yes...', the vulture muttered, clawing at your shoulders. '...he doesn't need you... and you do not need him. Come with me, little soldier, I will show you how to lead...'

'TRUE GLORY CAN ONLY BE ACHIEVED BY FACING YOUR ENEMIES!!'

'I can show you wondrous things and make reality itself bend to your whims.'
Show me your world, o Changer of Ways!
Then take away the stain of magic, Lord of Skulls, so that I may serve you better!

You've decided to undertake the arduous task of learning magic by your own. You do not know how long will it take, nor if you have the potential to become a mage in the first place, but you're determined to find out. Which branch of magic would you like to focus your efforts on?
The Lore of Ice.
The Lore of Metal
The Lore of Fire
The Lore of Death
The Lore of Shadows
The Lore of Beasts
The Lore of Heavens
The Lore of Light
The Lore of Life
Learning magic with no tutor nor organization of learned experts at your back is no easy task. How would you like to proceed next?
I need to buy more books and materials.
I'll experiment and see what happens.
I need to buy more books and materials.
I'll experiment and see what happens.
The more your personal laboratory increases in size, the higher the chances of unlocking your true magical potential. But you've still a long way to go.
Hmm...
You do not know exactly what you are doing, but you hope that by cautious observation of the trial and error method, you will manage to understand the mysteries of the Winds of Magic.
Now, if I mix this with that...
The explosion was luckily contained, but it still managed to wound you.
Damnations!
A potion explodes right into your face, slowly melting your skin off.
Aaaarrgghh!!
This is likely to be your last experiment. The resulting explosion has destroyed your laboratory and blown away half of your body.
Grrlllcht...

It's been hard trying to figure it all out with no materials, no school, no master, but you've made it: you can feel your power and call upon it using the proper words and gestures. You are finally a mage.
You've tried your best, but without a Master you're just running blind. There's no way you'll ever learn magic this way.
Yes!
Damn.
As the executioner approaches, the daemon spits a curse in the dark tongue and disappears in a flash, leaving no trace behind.
Hopefully the headman's axe scared it off.
No cell can hold a creature of the warp. A few words and reality bends to facilitate your escape.
Free again!
There are so many mortals to play with. So sad they are so easy to break.
There's more where this came from.
You've rallied an experienced group of hunters, hoping they will manage to track and destroy the evil creature infesting your court.
Go forth and bring me its head!
The hunters have returned to you with the head of the wretched daemon. Your realm is finally free of its evil presence.
Rejoice!
The hunters tried their best, but the daemon eluded their traps. It left only their mangled remains as a warning against future attempts to eliminate it.
Hmm... hopefully we have reserves.
The minds of the mortals are easy to manipulate and you take a special delight in pitting those clueless fools one against the other.
Yeah!
Sometimes you cannot just stand the sight of your friends and colleagues.
I hate you!
There are so many people waiting to receive the gifts of the Lord of the Flies. And you have plenty to give yet.
Gloorrrgh!!!
You've been feeling rather sick, when suddenly horrible rashes and boils erupt from your skin.
Gh...
The mortals entangled themselves so beautifully with lust and lies. It takes only a little nudge to let the shroud unravel in a wondrous cascade of passion and violence.
Glamorous!
Each night you dream of your spouse in bed with someone else. Last night, you could see their faces, you are certain now this is no dream.
How could you!?!
Isn't it wondrous to roam free in the lands to spread Chaos wherever and whenever you please?
It sure is.

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] approaches you with a hungry gaze and you realize your [GetFromFromRelation] has decided to feast upon you. The vampire seems aware of your fears and tries to calm you down, reassuring you that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wishes to give you the dark gift.

When you meet [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] room, the reason for your summoning becomes clear: [GetFromFromRelation] wishes to turn you into [From.GetHerHis] thrall and share your friendship forever.

You meet with [FromFrom.GetFirstName] under the pale moonlight and before [FromFrom.GetSheHe] can even speak, you know what [FromFrom.GetSheHe]'s about to ask: your [GetFromFromRelation] wishes you to share in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] love for all eternity.

Your [GetFromFromRelation] has called you to [FromFrom.GetHerHis] rooms and is now ordering you to lay down. It appears [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has decided to honour you with [FromFrom.GetHerHis] dark gift.
Kiss me!
I will never be like you!
No! Get away from me!
Your [GetFromRelation] has asked you for the dark gift, and swears eternal fealty if you would but grant this heartfelt desire.
Your friend [From.GetFirstName] has asked you for the dark gift, stating that [From.GetSheHe] wants to follow and assist you beyond death itself.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has asked you for the dark gift, wishing to share your love for eternity.

Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has asked you for the dark gift, stating [From.GetSheHe] could not bear the thought of death ending your shared bond and forcing [From.GetSheHe] to leave you alone.
Your [GetFromRelation] bestows the dark gift upon you, and bids you serve [From.GetHerHim] faithfully until the end of your days.
The bounds of friendship will outlast the fickle nature of life, at least for what concerns you and [From.GetFirstName]. Your [GetFromRelation] has agreed to grant you the dark gift.

Death shall not part you and [From.GetFirstName]: once [From.GetSheHe] has bestowed upon you [From.GetHerHis] dark blessing, you awake as preternatural creature of the night, to be at [From.GetHerHis] side forever.
Love will conquer death itself: [From.GetFirstName] gave you the dark kiss and you are now bound together as immortal souls, forever sharing your passion for each other.
I have no desire to join this bloodline.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has refused your request to take [From.GetHerHis] place within your coven, thus staining your reputation.
A fledgling disobeying [Root.GetHerHis] Sire?!
One of your fledglings, [FromFrom.GetFirstName], has come to you asking to fully join your coven and be recognized as a member of your ancestral bloodline.
We accept you.
No.
You shall never be of this coven!
Your sire [From.GetFirstName] has denied you your request. While the same blood runs through your veins, you're yet to be recognized as part of the coven.
My time will come...

Your sire [From.GetFirstName] has denied you your request. While the same blood runs through your veins, you're yet to be recognized as part of the coven. And by heeding [From.GetHerHim], you might never be.
My time will come... one way or another...
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has accepted your request and allowed you to fully join in [From.GetHerHis] dark coven.
Good.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has gracefully accepted your offer and joined fully in your ancient coven, completely identifying with your bloodline.
As [From.GetSheHe] should have.
Your sire has fully accepted you as a member of their coven, yet you've still to receive a proper title within the household's possessions.
I will ask what is my right.
I can wait.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has come to you requesting a formal recognition by granting [From.GetHerHim] rulership over a part of your realm.
Very well.
I shall decide when it is time.
[From.GetFirstName] has granted your wish and bestowed upon you a holding to rule in the name of [From.GetHerHis] coven.
Excellent.
[From.GetFirstName] has denied your wish, berating you for trying to give [From.GetHerHim] commands.
But I deserve this!
Your [GetFromFromRelation] calls for you with a gentle tone, but when you near [FromFrom.GetHerHim] you realize too late that the dark creature has decided to feast upon your blood.
No! Leave me alone!
There truly is nothing more delicious than virgin blood. Your [GetFromRelation] has left the world of the living and joined you as child of the night.
Good for [From.GetHerHim].
The Blood God watches over you from his throne of skulls. What is your offer?
The greatest pyre to ever burn!
A great offering, so that he might remember me.
A large offering, so that he might notice me.
A small offering, to show my loyalty.
The Lord of Skulls is pleased with your offering. With a flash of fire and a burst of blood, a daemonic apparition floats down from the sky, allowing you to pick a boon of your choosing.
Some of your warriors, to crush my enemies!
Fill me with your strength!
Fill me with your energy!
The Lord of Skulls must be pleased with you, for after you offering has been burned, a daemonic creature tears its way into reality to offer its services to you.
You'll follow my orders from now on!
The Blood God favours you. As your offering burns, you feel yourself filling with unholy rage.
Raaaahhhh!!
The ground cracks and a great river of blood bursts forth to cover you and your followers. Clearly the Lord of Skulls looks you favourably.
Yes!
The Blood God favours you. As your offering burns, you feel yourself filling with rage.
Raaaahhhh!!
The smoke of your offering creates intricate designs, you can see the grand design of your patron, finally.
Yes!
Despite your effort, the Lord of Skulls has not reacted to your offering. Perhaps you've not given enough to satiate his thirst.
Grmmmh...
Papa Nurgle is always ready to dispense his gifts to all who are in need. All the same, he's happy to receive offering from his own followers.
The greatest pyre to ever burn!
A great offering, so that he might remember me.
A large offering, so that he might notice me.
A small offering, to show my loyalty.
The smoke of your offering covers the field with a noxious fog and a jolly voice resonates in your ears, thanking you for your gift and asking to pick a boon of your choosing in return.
I wish to receive magic, to better spread your gifts!
I wish my servants to love me as I love you!
I wish to share your gifts with all of my servants!
Papa Nurgle must be really pleased with you, for after you offering has been burned, a daemonic creature claws out of the ground, ready to hug and serve you.
I'm so happy to meet you, friend!
As your offering burns, you feel the love of Nurgle filling your heart.
Why can't we just all get along?
The smoke of your offering covers the field with a noxious green fog, undoubtedly proving the Lord of the Flies' unconditional love for you.
I love you!
As your offering burns, you feel Nurgle's generosity filling your heart.
Let everyone share in his gifts!
The fumes of the pyre fill your lungs and you can see the marvellous future the Lord of Flies has in store for you.
I'm coming Papa!
Papa Nurgle has certainly accepted your present, but it could be that others are in greater need of his gifts than you.
Don't worry, I'll wait for next time.
The Serpent always thirsts for more delights and greedily takes anything which is offered up. What will you offer Slaanesh?
The greatest pyre to ever burn!
A great offering, so that he might remember me.
A large offering, so that he might notice me.
A small offering, to show my loyalty.

The Dark Prince's voice resonates in your mind, you can feel his touch crawling beneath your skin. Your offering has momentarily pleased your Master, to the point they'll grant you a gift of your choice.
Grant me mastery over the Winds of Chaos.
Make me beautiful.
Heal my body so that I may be whole again!

One of the bodies on the pyre stands up and shakes off the flames, shambling away from the others. As it moves, the flesh crawls and flickers and when it reaches you, you realize it is a daemon, a gift from the Dark Prince.
Let us know each other, yes?
Like a beacon, the pyre draws a black pegasus to the field. The wild creature descends upon you and bows at your feet, clearly a gift from the Serpent.
How about turning around now?
The Dark Prince's voice resonates in your mind, you can feel his touch crawling beneath your skin. The Serpent's sweet words clearly show you must be amongst his favourites.
Never doubted it.
As the flames burn on the pyre, so too does a new lust inflame your soul, rekindled by the Dark Prince's touch.
Hmm...
The bodies on the pyre create the most interesting shapes while they burn. You can see the artistry of your Master behind them.
Yes... yes it is so clear!
You've waited until the last embers have gone cold, but there has been no response from your Master. The Dark Prince must have a poor disposition today.
Rats.
The Changer of Ways is fickle in his rewards and greedy in his requests. What shall you give to him?
The greatest pyre to ever burn!
A great offering, so that he might remember me.
A large offering, so that he might notice me.
A small offering, to show my loyalty.
Motes of unnatural light dance over the pyre and you can feel the Architect of Fate is looking at you, ready to grant your heart's desire.
Magic! Grant me the true power of Chaos!
Knowledge!
More power!
One of the bodies on the pyre explodes in a shower of gore. The melted remains come together into an unnatural shrieking mix, a daemonic gift from your Master.
I am your Master now.
As the smoke rises, you can feel the touch of Tzeentch upon you. The Changer of Ways has given you his greatest gift: magic.
Power over reality.
The shining smokes and twisting flames undoubtedly show the favour of your patron.
Good.
The Architect of Fate has looked at your offer and filled your mind with new and greater plans for you.
Yes, there's greatness in store for me!
The Architect of Fate has looked at your offer and filled your mind with new and greater plans for you.
Yes, there's greatness in store for me!
The Great Plotter's plan is yet to be uncovered. Nothing happened after your offering was sent.
Next time... next time...
The Gods blessed you on the fields of battle today. Your patron's eye is looking right inside your soul.
I am victorious!
Only the best survive the endless trials of the gods. You are more than all the others, you are a true champion of your patron.
Glorious.
There is no doubt your god has something special in mind for you. You have received many gifts and have ascended as a chosen servant of your deity.
I shall be eternal!

The time has come. You've endured hardship, you've survived all of your patron's generous gifts, you've outdone the efforts of others to please your deity, and he has finally rewarded you with the ultimate gift: you leave your old husk and in a storm of twisting bone and melding flesh you achieve apotheosis and are reborn as an immortal Daemon Prince.
Reaaaahhh!!

[From.GetFirstName] struggles desperately within your clutches, but it's too late for [From.GetHerHim]. You open your jaws and suck [From.GetHerHis] delicious soul from the pathetic husk, feasting upon [From.GetHerHis] essence.
Marvellous.
The terrible daemon who captured you has the worst in store for you: dragging you out of your cage with its claws, the creature reaps your soul out of the body and feasts upon it.
Hhhhhhhhh!!!
The host of daemons emerges from the aether, ready to follow your lead and scourge the lands of the mortals.
March!
Your daemonic forces disband, dragged back into the Realms of Chaos.
Learning magic with no tutor nor organization of learned experts at your back is no easy task. Necromancy also has quite the bad reputation. How would you like to proceed next?
I need to buy more books and materials.
I'll experiment and see what happens.
I need to buy more books and materials.
I'll experiment and see what happens.
The more your personal laboratory increases in size, the higher the chances of unlocking your true magical potential. But you've still a long way to go.
Hmm...
You do not know exactly what you are doing, but you hope that by cautious observation of the trial and error method, you will come to understand the mysteries of the Winds of Magic.
If only there was an easier way to find fresh corpses...

It is said that the secret of necromancy lies within the clutches of the undead. Yet, with the proper resources, you might be able to search for a copy of Nagash's books and reach enlightenment without the need to grovel at the feet of a vampire.
I shall search for the book.
This is beneath me. My will already moves the dead.
I will ask my dread liege for assistance.
I can manage on my own.

It has taken a considerable amount of time and money, but finally a copy of the Liber Mortis, written by the Great Necromancer, is within your hands. And yet, now that you can see the ancient book, you are not certain if you could handle the dark secrets hidden within its pages.
It's too late to turn back now!
I do not dare to open it...

The secrets within the works of Nagash might be unbearable for weaker minds, but they could not break your will or your thirst for knowledge. You've discovered more than you could possibly imagine within those old pages.
Hmm...
The secrets within the works of Nagash might be unbearable for weaker minds, but they could not break your will or your thirst for knowledge.
Hmm...
You've learned much from the works of Nagash, but the cursed words have slowly wormed their way into your mind, giving you distorted visions of the future and horrid hallucinations.
No! Get it away!

The secrets of the book were too much for your mind to handle. The dark forces embedded within the cursed writings of the Great Necromancer destroyed your mind and left you a withered husk. Perhaps someone more fortunate will continue your work.
Hhhh...

As an ancient King of Nehekhara, the power of the dead is already entwined within your very essence. Thousands of servants awake at your command, answering to the call of their old master. Yet you cannot create more. Perhaps experimenting upon your undead subject might unlock the secret.
It is necessary.
I shall not harm my loyal servants.

Your undead servants have submitted to your wishes, allowing you to perform all sorts of experiments upon them. In the repetitive and orderly fashion, hallmark of the Nehekharan society, you've managed to slowly make progress with your studies. You finally start to see the merits of Nagash's methods.
Good. Another hundred here.
Regardless of the countless servants spent and days of study and experimenting, the secret of Nagash's necromancy still eludes you.
Curses.

Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has gained an interest in necromancy. Clueless as [From.GetSheHe] is on the matters of death and unlife, [From.GetSheHe] has wisely decided to ask you for guidance.
Sure, I will teach you.
I can teach you, but only if you abandon your gods.
Let me kiss you and you shall know everything.
You're not worthy.
[From.GetFirstName] is interested in helping you uncover the secrets of the dark arts, but only if you forsake your gods and bow to the unliving.
As you command.
Never!
[From.GetFirstName] has accepted your terms and abandoned [From.GetHerHis] failed gods to follow you.
Good... Let me educate you.
[From.GetFirstName] has refused your terms, preferring to cling to [From.GetHerHis] failed gods rather than learn the secrets of eternal life.
So be it.
[From.GetFirstName] has considered your request and decided to assist you, with no request on [From.GetHerHis] part.
A great gift, thank you.

[From.GetFirstName] has accepted to help you, but only if you first allow [From.GetHerHim] to bestow upon you the dark gift. As it stands, [From.GetFirstName] assures you your studies will be much easier once you've become an immortal undead as well.
A great opportunity!
I wish to control the dead, not be one!
Your [GetFromRelation] has accepted your terms and allowed you in [From.GetHerHis] chambers so that you could give [From.GetHerHim] the dark kiss.
Your [GetFromRelation] has stubbornly refused your gift, still too attached to [From.GetHerHis] fleeting life to see the wisdom in your offer.
So be it.
Sadly, [From.GetFirstName] has not considered you worthy of receiving [From.GetHerHis] ancient knowledge.
On my own, then. As usual.
It's been hard trying to figure it all out with no materials, no school, no master, but you've made it, you're finally a necromancer. Through your will, the dead can walk and speak once more.
You've tried your best, but without a guide you're just running blind. There's no way you'll ever learn the secrets of undeath this way.
Yes!
Damnation.

Your [GetFromRelation] has approached you, offering [From.GetHerHis] knowledge of the dark arts. For some reason [From.GetSheHe] believes you might become a powerful necromancer under [From.GetHerHis] guidance.
Sounds intriguing...
Not interested.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has rejected your offer of power over death.
The fool.

Teaching necromancy is no easy task. There are many dangers waiting in the art of summoning the spirits of the dead and sparking a semblance of life within corpses. What should you have your apprentice focus their attention on?
Caution is what's really important.
Daring is what a necromancer needs.
Focus above everything.
It is time to test [From.GetHerHim].
